snippet: New Zealanders were outraged last week when an online journalist was able to use a public computer to gain access to sensitive information from the Ministry of Social Development. He found case files including the names of debtors, children up for...
abstract: New Zealanders were outraged last week when an online journalist was able to use a public computer to gain access to sensitive information from the Ministry of Social Development. He found case files including the names of debtors, children up for adoption and a social services client who had attempted suicide.

headline.main: Anger in New Zealand Over Leaky Government Computers
